segments.text: Hey , Dora ! What kind of books do you like to read ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I read everything I can get my hands on but I like love stories best . What do you think about the love stories ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate to tell you this , but they are nothing but sob stories .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . I like them . Then what's your favorite book ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , the history books are dull to me .
segments.speaker: S2
